For the weighted gamlss regressions - independent vars & interaction with time

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(gamlss)
```

```{r}
# Of course this also has to be done for the other lists of the other models
load("/Users/anuschka/Documents/climatechange/climatechange/data/final_data/regression_outputs/ess_list_preds_w.RData")

# This does mean that the estimates of the sigma are in a different place
sum <- summary(ess_list_preds[[1]])


# Store the results in a new dataframe
ess_indep_preds_df <- data.frame(dep_var = character())

# Loop over the list of models
for (i in seq_along(ess_list_preds)) {

  # Extract the dependent variable so that we know for which dep var the effects are
  dep_var <- as.character(ess_list_preds[[i]]$mu.terms[[2]])
  
    # Summarize the model
  sum <- summary(ess_list_preds[[i]])
  
  # Extract the intercept and standard deviation for mu and sigma
  mu_sex_est <- sum[[3]]
  mu_sex_sd <- sum[[3,2]]
  mu_isced_est <- sum[[4]]
  mu_isced_sd <- sum[[4,2]]
  mu_urban_est <- sum[[5]]
  mu_urban_sd <- sum[[5,2]]
  mu_income_est <- sum[[7]]
  mu_income_sd <- sum[[7,2]]
  mu_age_est <- sum[[8]]
  mu_age_sd <- sum[[8,2]]
  mu_lr_est <- sum[[9]]
  mu_lr_sd <- sum[[9,1]]
  
  # Variance
  sig_sex_est <- sum[[13]]
  sig_sex_sd <- sum[[13,2]]
  sig_isced_est <- sum[[14]]
  sig_isced_sd <- sum[[14,2]]
  sig_urban_est <- sum[[15]]
  sig_urban_sd <- sum[[15,2]]
  sig_income_est <- sum[[17]]
  sig_income_sd <- sum[[17,2]]
  sig_age_est <- sum[[18]]
  sig_age_sd <- sum[[18,2]]
  sig_lr_est <- sum[[19]]
  sig_lr_sd <- sum[[19,1]]

  
  # Put the results 
  ess_indep_preds_df <- rbind(ess_indep_preds_df, data.frame(dep_var = dep_var, mu_sex_est, mu_sex_sd, mu_isced_est, mu_isced_sd, mu_urban_est, mu_urban_sd, mu_income_est, mu_income_sd, mu_age_est, mu_age_sd, mu_lr_est, mu_lr_sd, sig_sex_est, sig_sex_sd, sig_isced_est, sig_isced_sd, sig_urban_est, sig_urban_sd, sig_income_est, sig_income_sd, sig_age_est, sig_age_sd, sig_lr_est, sig_lr_sd))
}

save(ess_indep_preds_df, file="/Users/anuschka/Documents/climatechange/climatechange/data/final_data/indep_var/ess_indep_var_df_w.RData")

```
